Title: MSAD 28 School Board: Maintain MSAD 28 Custodial Staff
Targets:
Keep our school community safe. Do not outsource our school custodians who are an important part of the school community. They not only keep the buildings safe and clean they usher students safely into and out of the buildings chaperone activities and respond to daily safety needs. The custodial staff works hard to make sure our buildings are safe and clean for all who enter -- community members school employees and students.   Outsourcing threatens the safety of the students and staff. Our custodians know who belongs in each building and who doesn't. This is not something an outside contractor will be able to do.  The MSAD 28 faculty uses the buildings on weekends and weekends and deserve to know that the custodians are to be trusted and invested in our buildings.     Please keep our MSAD28 custodians and say no to outsourcing! 

Sincerely  
[Your name]
